Real Stories. Real Experiences. Real Customers
My Dubai experience with McXotic Tours was nothing short of phenomenal!

I have nothing but high praises for my experience with Nadine my travel agent.. my husband and I recently went to Dubai and had excursions booked. Before the trip we had an itinerary all set up with dates and times and the evening before we got a text informing of our meeting time. The excursions were top notch and well worth the price.
Santorini was everything I dreamed of—and more—thanks to McXotic Tours!

September 2024 was pure magic. From the iconic whitewashed views to unforgettable sunsets and sisterhood vibes, every moment was picture-perfect. Nadine curated a flawless experience that blended culture, relaxation, and connection. McXotic Tours made Greece feel like home, and I’m already planning my next journey!
Egypt was my sixth adventure with McXotic Tours—and they continue to exceed every expectation!

From cruising the Nile to standing in awe before the Pyramids, every detail was flawlessly curated. Nadine always brings the perfect balance of culture, luxury, and sisterhood. I keep coming back because no one does group travel like McXotic Tours. Already counting down to trip number seven!
Bali 2022 with McXotic Tours was nothing short of magical!

Every moment—from temple tours to spa days—was beautifully curated. I felt pampered, empowered, and surrounded by an amazing sisterhood. This wasn’t just a trip, it was an experience I’ll cherish forever. Can’t wait to travel with McXotic Tours again!
My Dubai experience with McXotic Tours was nothing short of phenomenal!

Nadine, the owner and operator, went above and beyond to tailor the itinerary perfectly for our group. From luxurious accommodations to exceptional service and seamless professionalism, everything was thoughtfully executed. I highly recommend joining McXotic Tours—you’ll create unforgettable memories and travel in absolute style.
Several Trips and I love them all

Done more than one trip with McXotic Tours First trip was to Dubai and I had so much fun. The trip was so well organized to this day I still cannot believe I got all that for the money paid. Next trip was a European tour from Paris, London, Amsterdam and Belgium. Let me tell you the places I went was beyond speechless. If you are on the fence about them, get off.
